00041 void uvm_ml_register( \
00042   sc_core::sc_port<tlm::IF<T>,N,POL>* p \
00043 ) { \
00044   uvm_ml_register_internal(p); \

00095 
00096 template <typename REQ, typename RSP, int N, sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> 
00097 void uvm_ml_register( 
00098   sc_core::sc_port<tlm::tlm_transport_if<REQ,RSP>,N,POL>* p 
00099 ) { 
00100   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;
00101   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; 
00102   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport<REQ,RSP>* trans = 
00103     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm_transport<REQ,RSP>(s.c_str()); 
00104   p->bind(*trans); 
00105   trans->object(p); 
00106   trans->set_intf_name("tlm_transport_if");
00107   trans->set_REQ_name(REQ().get_type_name());
00108   trans->set_RSP_name(RSP().get_type_name());
00109 } 
00110 
00111 template <typename REQ, typename RSP> 
00112 void uvm_ml_register( 
00113   sc_core::sc_export<tlm::tlm_transport_if<REQ,RSP> >* p 
00114 ) { 
00115   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;
00116   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_rec"; 
00117   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<REQ,RSP>* rec =  
00118     new uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<REQ,RSP>(s.c_str()); 
00119   rec->bind_export(p); 
00120   rec->set_intf_name("tlm_transport_if");
00121   rec->set_REQ_name(REQ().get_type_name());
00122   rec->set_RSP_name(RSP().get_type_name());
00123 }

00128 void uvm_ml_register( 
00129   sc_core::sc_port<tlm::tlm_master_if<REQ,RSP>,N,POL>* p 
00130 ) { 
00131   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;
00132   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; 
00133   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<REQ,RSP>* trans = 
00134     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<REQ,RSP>(s.c_str()); 
00135   p->bind(*trans); 
00136   trans->object(p); 
00137   trans->set_intf_name("tlm_master_if");
00138   trans->set_REQ_name(REQ().get_type_name());
00139   trans->set_RSP_name(RSP().get_type_name());

00142 template <typename REQ, typename RSP> 
00143 void uvm_ml_register( 
00144   sc_core::sc_export<tlm::tlm_master_if<REQ,RSP> >* p 
00145 ) { 
00146   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;
00147   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_rec"; 
00148   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<REQ,RSP>* rec =  
00149     new uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<REQ,RSP>(s.c_str()); 
00150   rec->bind_export(p); 
00151   rec->set_intf_name("tlm_master_if");
00152   rec->set_REQ_name(REQ().get_type_name());
00153   rec->set_RSP_name(RSP().get_type_name());

00157 
00158 template <typename REQ, typename RSP, int N, sc_core::sc_port_policy POL> 
00159 void uvm_ml_register( 
00160   sc_core::sc_port<tlm::tlm_slave_if<REQ,RSP>,N,POL>* p 
00161 ) { 
00162   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;
00163   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_trans"; 
00164   // slave_if is templated by <REQ,RSP>, and it does put(RSP&) and
00165   // get(REQ&). A transmitter always does put(T1) and get(T2), so 
00166   // we need to instantiate transmitter templated by <RSP,REQ>
00167   uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<RSP,REQ>* trans = 
00168     new uvm_ml_tlm_transmitter_tlm<RSP,REQ>(s.c_str()); 
00169   p->bind(*trans); 
00170   trans->object(p); 
00171   trans->set_intf_name("tlm_slave_if");
00172   // REQ_name and RSP_name are set according to the sc_port argument order
00173   // which is <REQ,RSP> because we will check compatibility of 
00174   // sc_port<tlm_slave_if<REQ,RSP> > with uvm_slave_imp#(REQ,RSP), and
00175   // that should match
00176   trans->set_REQ_name(REQ().get_type_name());
00177   trans->set_RSP_name(RSP().get_type_name());
00178 } 
00179 
00180 template <typename REQ, typename RSP> 
00181 void uvm_ml_register( 
00182   sc_core::sc_export<tlm::tlm_slave_if<REQ,RSP> >* p 
00183 ) { 
00184   if (uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::reset_detected()) return;
00185   std::string s = std::string(p->basename()) + "_rec"; 
00186   // slave_if is templated by <REQ,RSP>, and it does put(RSP&) and
00187   // get(REQ&). A receiver always does put(T1) and get(T2), so 
00188   // we need to instantiate receiver templated by <RSP,REQ>
00189   uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<RSP,REQ>* rec =  
00190     new uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_tlm<RSP,REQ>(s.c_str()); 
00191   rec->bind_export(p); 
00192   // REQ_name and RSP_name are set according to the sc_port argument order
00193   // which is <REQ,RSP> because we will check compatibility of 
00194   // sc_export<tlm_slave_if<REQ,RSP> > with uvm_slave_port#(REQ,RSP), and that
00195   // should match
00196   rec->set_intf_name("tlm_slave_if");
00197   rec->set_REQ_name(REQ().get_type_name());
00198   rec->set_RSP_name(RSP().get_type_name());
00199 }

00205 template <class T> void print_uvm(std::ostream& os, T* val, void* t) {
00206   std::cerr << "print_uvm<T*>" << std::endl;
00207   os << *val << std::endl;
00208 }
00209 
00210 template <class T> void print_uvm(std::ostream& os, const T* val, const void* t) {
00211   std::cerr << "print_uvm<T*>" << std::endl;
00212   os << *val << std::endl;
00213 }
00214 
00215 template <class T> void print_uvm(std::ostream& os, T* val, uvm::uvm_object* t) {
00216   std::cerr << "print_uvm<uvm_object*>" << std::endl;
00217   val->print(os);
00218 }
00219 
00220 template <class T> void print_uvm(std::ostream& os, const T* val, const uvm::uvm_object* t) {
00221   std::cerr << "print_uvm<const uvm_object*>" << std::endl;
00222   val->print(os);
00223 }

00238 ::sc_core::sc_module* F_##w(const char* name) { return new w(name); } \
00239 static int dummy_##w = associate_module(#w, F_##w);
